channel.title: How to set fists hit slower?

item.title: How to set fists hit slower?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:2, topic:70237”]try .1 not -1[/quote]Tried but it didnt work, however no errors. should i put ‘else’ before the if? and should i put the ID like [playerWeapon] == (.1) or [playerWeapon] == .1?
I got the -1 ID from that at the select attack type thingy, it writes the name of the weapon, and the ID. It was: “Weapon:No Item ID:-1”

EDIT:
Nevermind, i got it to work!!! YAY!! all i needed to do is

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= (1)) //fists! { PkingDelay = 7; wepdelay = 7; }and it works! anyways, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How to set fists hit slower?

item.title: How to set fists hit slower?
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.source: How to set fists hit slower?

item.title: How to set fists hit slower?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi,

I have a big problem since i started private servering, that when my charater doesnt have anything in its hand(unarmed) i try to fight an npc and it starts hitting it like CRAZY! 4 hits per second! Is there a way to make it slower? Because this makes my server too easy.

My server is testscape based.

I’ve tried to look into pimpscape’s client.java, and also project 16’s, but i didnt find anything that would make the fists hit slower, but the fists DO hit slower on those servers. I also discovered an

else { wepdelay = 10; pkingdelay = 10; }near the very last of the "if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == "s but they are the same on all 3 sources. i tried to make a delay myself,

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) //fists! { PkingDelay = 7; wepdelay = 7; }but it didnt work, and it also messed up the fists, i couldnt attack with them! How can i get this annoying thing to work? Any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: How to set fists hit slower?
